ComicInfo.Summary:
Sally is kidnapped by a gang who wants one of their members named Denby released from jail or they will kill her.
Sally is told by the Chief that they have been given the case concerning the big Farrington Diamond, and tells Sally will be the maid in the Farrington home to keep an eye on things.
ComicInfo.Writer: Adolphe Barreaux,Harry Parkhurst,Joseph Szokoli,Robert Leslie Bellem,Joseph Sokoli,Joseph Sokoli
ComicInfo.Title: Hawaiian Spy Hunt; Zoot Suit Killers; Ultimatum!!; Betty Carries On; The Kidnap Trail; Midnight Ransom; Maid To Order
